headline: Robinhood Launches New Tools to Woo Traders
summary: Robinhood Markets  ushered millions of traders into the world of investing.  The financial services company with meme-stock origins is introducing two new features that will bring more sophisticated trading capabilities to its mobile app, including a tool that lets users preview simulated returns before they place an options trade.  The brokerage is also launching advanced charting capabilities on mobile devices, borrowed from its desktop trading platform launched last fall.

raw.headline: Robinhood Launches New Tools to Woo Traders

headline: Coinbase seeking SEC approval for tokenized equities trading
summary: Investing.com -- Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) is working to gain approval from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to offer "tokenized equities" to its customers, the company’s chief legal officer Paul Grewal told Reuters on Tuesday.
